body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Repairs Inc. My name is Kenneth Moore. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kenneth, my name is Marie Torres.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. Could you please provide me with your phone number with the area code spelled out?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight six seven - two three four - five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. Next, may I have your email address spelled out character by character?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's m a r i e t o r r e s a t g m a i l d o t c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Marie. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am nervous about the shipping process for my car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that shipping can be daunting. Please rest assured that we will guide you through the process step by step. Thank you for sharing your concerns, Marie.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Marie. Please feel free to reach out if you have any more questions. Have a great day!
